review: SB暴雪
bardzo łatwa gra i fajna i wykracza poza granice realności co jest fajne  nie jak cs że masz tylko kilka broni i tyle tu masz postacie z fajnymi umiejętnościami
暴毙，烤狄克
不会的哦，我们的游戏正在蒸蒸日上哦！

从2016年加入ow先锋，抽烟天使，贴膜以及印度飞饼阿三，死神的死魂球，半藏的散，如今好玩的技能全删了，还有以前哪里来的这种恶心的定级的，以前虽然上不了分，是玩的没有现在这么恼火，且游戏乐趣还是十足的，，阿奴比斯神殿，沃斯卡亚工业区，经典的地图全删了，开箱子的乐趣被恶心的战令取而代之，换了归来，我的1050ti显卡换成了3070就为了玩个守望先锋，国服没了开加速器玩，198买的畅玩版本最初，后面花198买了国际版，然后又升级198买了个归来大礼包，结果你这吃相做法简直就是要把你们自己归西，游戏删了又下下了，下了又删，我也就只会玩这么个电竞游戏，就像是你男朋友把你绿了，你原谅他了，然后他变本加厉在你的头上开拓青青草原，不看重中国市场别来啊，去你的韩国市场去，暴雪你现在就是这种行为不要太下头，姐夫走了后这游戏就越来越衰败，现在上steam国服账号依旧是骨灰盒，还有我几年肝来的的全皮肤就更别说了，不说了，游戏已卸载，吃相不改，狗都不玩，tui
我的评价是：不！如！多！索！雷！斯！
突出的就是个好评如潮
傻逼暴雪

Broken promises and whatever other romantic attachments people have towards corporations notwithstanding game is pretty fun, 5v5 is much better than 6v6, prices of skins imho aren't justified but ultimate skins are good. Game looks good, plays decently, there are better ways to spend time out there but what is there is okay enough.

Update: eheh little rats made previously ftp currency skins into the gold currency ones (converted from real currencies). All I can say is, good luck.

u know why i do this

各位，我算的上是ow老玩家了，17年在小学寒假花了198买的，第一次买的游戏，没有零花钱完的都是盗版
关服的时候高三的寒假根本没有时间更换账号，而且那个沟八暴雪必须要海外手机号
我的小女警，我的日本源，我的鲨鱼猪，我的绿毛死神，我的雪原猩猩，我的西伯利亚毛妹.............
什么都没了
不过没关系，这都能重新攒，以前谁不是一个箱子一个箱子地攒出来的呢
没想到我太高估暴雪这狗东西的底线了，免费换来的就是无休止的氪金，这byd怕不是就想在这游戏上最后捞一笔，整这种流氓玩法
网易还能忍这小byd这么久也是有本事
ui不如第一代，5v5不如6v6灵活，音乐更是缺少了第一代的荣耀感，还你mb要解锁英雄
说实话，把tm守望1拉出来都比这套皮狗屎看着更像次世代游戏
归来就tm是依托答辩，我他奶奶的快气疯了
我他妈现在打字语无伦次，怒火中烧
就盼着暴雪四了，到时候我去把它们的骨灰埋在它妈妈的上面
墓志铭都想好了

Uninstalled the game the same day I got it.
 I know all the shenanigans Blizzard has been up to and despite that I still got the game for the sole purpose of doing a bit of trolling. I was going to go into a match and see what I could get way with saying in chat before inevitably getting banned. But nothing I could say was any worse than what the active community was already saying. The remaining playerbase is so toxic and hostile the only thing I could do to really piss them of is giving the courteous GG after a match I had lost. I wasn't going to join the review bombing that so many others have already done because I thought it would be unfair to go in just to troll the hell out of people then bash the game, but obviously the community doesn't care about this game enough to act civil to their fellow players.
 So here you go Overwatch it was fun when the devs and community still cared.

Blizzard and Overwatch

just ignoring all of the horrible hero reworks, art style redirections, monetization decisions, and competitive ranking changes made with overwatch "2", they did not stick with the thing that gave this game a right to be a sequel, of course im talking about the separate rpg with skills and quests that was going to be the paid part of overwatch 2 while the pvp part of the game became free, not only did they alter nearly everything that made the game cool, they canceled the thing that was to solidify the "2" in the title, now i feel it necessary with all the misinformation spread around about this to also state that you should not direct your anger at the developers, theyre just making the game, they made all of the cool stuff for overwatch: the rpg and are probably just as upset as us about this whole thing, the executives are the ones who made the decision to cancel the rpg, more specifically, bobby kotick, pretty much every bad decision with the overwatch ip since activisions acquisition of blizzard can be traced back to bobby kotick

The team responsible for Overwatch is quite disheartening. They have transformed an incredible game into something rather disappointing. Furthermore, they have ceased development on the promised PVE content that was anticipated upon launch of Overwatch 2. Observing the gradual decline of this game with each update is disheartening and distressing. Despite the community's fervent expressions of dissatisfaction and frustration, it appears that the prospect of implementing meaningful changes to restore the game's quality is not being seriously entertained. Don't get me wrong I still love this game for it's play style and the memorys I have but the days of Overwatch are long gone and probably will never come back

暴雪司马

如果你看的了份差评，
请不要划过。
我知道这里是守望先锋的评论区，
但如果你或你的朋友曾经是一位艾泽拉斯的勇士，
那么，
请你看完。

曾经有一个美好的虚拟世界，
无数的冒险者和勇士为之奋斗了十数年。
他（她）们知道那是个虚拟的世界，全部只是数字。
但在大家的心中那就是真实的世界，第二份人生。
这就是艾泽拉斯！

无数的敌人妄图毁灭艾泽拉斯。
可这个世界的守护者们又是这么的顽强。
燃烧军团没有成功，
天灾亡灵没有成功，
死亡之翼没有成功，
上古之神没有成功，
甚至远古的泰坦和群星彼岸的敌人都未曾成功。

但
这个世界
被他的创造者亲手毁灭了。

无数的冒险者和勇士
失去了家园，
失去了战友，
失去了故事。

当服务器关闭的那一刻，
世界终结了，
仅留下一具数字尸体。
勇士们不知道如何才能唤醒这具尸体，
冒险者们不知道这个世界是否还能再起，
我们甚至不知道去那里可以呼喊。

因为毁灭世界的大敌，
只会龟缩自己的战网城堡中，
龟缩着嘲笑每位艾泽拉斯的勇士。

但今天不同了！
艾泽拉斯的勇士们！

告知你们曾经战友，一起下载steam！
下载steam，为OW2留下差评！
这不是正义的战争！
这可能是没有结果的抗辩！
但这是魔兽世界国服的呐喊！

艾泽拉斯的勇士们！
释放你们的愤怒！
用差评的武器！
攻击暴雪！

为了艾泽拉斯！

[h1]还我国服数据和皮肤[/h1]
我怀念爽玩动感斗球的每一个夏天，怀念起早贪黑看的每一场比赛，
听到Askery的《Headlights》我又会想起17年看OWPS的纯粹和开心，
微博仍替我记得看OWL时竞猜赛果和见证冠军诞生的热血澎湃，
看到熟悉的地图还能回响起系统语音和交战情景，
...
但这一切就好像梦一场，突然全都消失了。

暴雪死了，我的心也和国服一起殉了，
有游戏做得很像你但终究不再是你，
曾经爱你有十分，如今恨你就有百分。
没那味了，匹配机制也稀烂

只能说我的青春是16年那年夏天的守望1，不是现在这样恶心的守望2亦或者暴雪。
一切一切的吃相让人恶心，你如果死活不出简中看到有人想玩就封 铁了心跟中国玩家对着干，我都会说你是一条硬气美国忠犬

Removing standard levels and with that getting chests for leveling up(For people who don't know you could get them for free as as a reward for leveling up and you had chance to get every rarity of item ranging from common to legendary) and replacing them with battle pass(Levels are now called battle pass tiers that resets every season of battle pass) and store with skins that cost the same as good indie games or some AAA games was the worst idea they could for already dying game at that point,you now only can get free items from free battle pass tiers but they are so laughable compared to random drop from chests that you COULD GET FOR FREE JUST BY LEVELING UP YOUR ACCOUNT WHILE PLAYING THE GAME OH YEA DON'T EVEN GET ME STARTED THAT YOU COULD GET FREE 4 CHESTS FROM ARCADE MODE EVERY WEEK YEA THEY DELETED THOSE REWARDS TOO now playing it with only free battle pass is basically pointless when you want to get items you get laughable rewards so it's not worth it in my opinion and you don't even have some sort of progression  because levels ehkem sorry BATTLE PASS TIERS NOW resets every season of battle pass so if you want to be cool among friends or random people because of high level you can't because BATTLE PASS TIERS resets every season with that change they reverted to old games like CS 1.6 that didn't had level system
The only good thing about Overwatch 2 is better UI in my opinion and full fledged PVE would be cool too probably but they scrapped it so uhh yea UI is the only good thing about it now 
I'm still gonna play Overwatch 2 but only with friends for fun,when Overwatch 1 was a thing i remember playing it because it was actually fun alone you had some sort of progression,chance of getting good free loot but now when Overwatch 2 became a thing that replaced Overwatch 1 it's only a good game for playing with friends sometimes 
TL;DR
Overwatch 1 was better,play Team fortress 2 https://store.steampowered.com/app/440/Team_Fortress_2/ or play Overwatch 2 but only with friends playing it alone is not worth it
